text: (napiye!) Nir (hut napiyakiya) ‘atu' utaiya cakotararai ninaivu kuruviraka. Avarukku munnum, pinnum tutarkal palar (avarkalitam) vantirukkinranar. (Avar) tan makkalai ‘ahkahp' enra (manarpankana) itattil (cantittu), ‘‘allahvait tavira (marrevaraiyum) ninkal vanankatirkal. Niccayamaka makattana nalin vetanai unkal mitu iranki vitumenru nan payappatukiren'' enru accamutti eccarittar
